mapper.insert: insert into brr_review (toilet_title, sessionId, sessionNickname, Profile, review, star, clean) values (#{toilet_title}, #{sessionId}, #{sessionNickname}, #{Profile}, #{review}, #{star}, #{clean})
mapper.select: select * from (select * from brr_review where toilet_title like #{toilet_title} order by inputdate desc) where rownum < 4
select count(*) from brr_review where #{_parameter} like '%' || toilet_title || '%'
